001package reversi;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004
005public class Piece extends Object{
006    private Integer color;
007    private Integer count;
008    private Color viewColor;
009
010    public Piece(Integer aColor){
011        color = aColor;
012        count = 0;
013        return;
014    }
015
016    public void setViewColor(Color aColor){
017        viewColor = aColor;
018        return;
019    }
020
021    public Color getViewColor(){
022        return viewColor;
023    }
024
025    public Integer getColor(){
026        return color;
027    }
028
029    public void increment(){
030        count++;
031        return;
032    }
033
034    public void decrement(){
035        count--;
036        return;
037    }
038
039    public Integer getCount(){
040        return count;
041    }
042}
